Business Development

Outbound Services: Turnkey multi-channel campaigns designed and executed at scale

Why Outsource?

Success

  • An outsourced lead-generation department can bring up to 43% better results than an in-house one. 3 months of lead-gen outsourcing bring you the same results as 12 months of in house lead-gen, with smaller costs & bigger ROI.
  • SDR turnover is 34.7% in the US. We are not considering the cost of time with unfulfilled role, recruiting associated costs and potential lost revenue from missed deals.
  • Annual savings for outsourcing SDR´s + other benefits
